title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.
OB: The CVS repository view is no longer maximized after switching perspectives from Java to Resource and then back to Java perspective.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized after switching perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce this bug:
1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.
2. Double click the title bar to maximize it.
3. Switch to the Resource perspective.
4. Come back to the Java perspective.
